description: This file defines an AuthProvider class for managing authentication state, including token management and notifying listeners of changes. It also provides a function to create a list of app providers incorporating the AuthProvider, used for dependency injection in a Flutter app.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages user authentication state, including storing a token and notifying listeners on changes.

methods.name: signInWithToken
methods.description: Stores the token and notifies listeners that authentication state has changed.

methods.name: signOut
methods.description: Clears the token and notifies listeners that the user has signed out.
